PSXApplication.name: sys_roleCataloger
PSXApplication.description: This application is used by the server to catalog roles, subjects, and attributes. The com.percussion.security.PSRoleManager class makes internal requests to this application.

PSXDataSet.name: sys_catalogRoles
PSXDataSet.description: Gets all of the roles (sorted by role name) belonging to the subjects defined by PSXParam/{sys_subjectNameFilter, sys_subjectType, sys_securityProvider}. All PSXParams are optional.

PSXDataSet.name: sys_catalogAllRoles
PSXDataSet.description: Obtains all roles (sorted by role name).

PSXDataSet.name: sys_catalogRoleAttributes
PSXDataSet.description: Gets all of the attributes (sorted by role name, attribute name, attribute value) belonging to the roles defined by the HTML parameters sys_roleNameFilter and sys_attributeNameFilter.

PSXDataSet.name: sys_catalogRoleSubjects
PSXDataSet.description: Gets a filtered set of subjects (sorted by role name and subject name) associated with a specific role defined by the HTML parameters sys_roleNameFilter and sys_subjectNameFilter.

PSXDataSet.name: sys_catalogSubjectAttributes
PSXDataSet.description: Gets a list of subjects that have matching attributes (sorted by subject name, attribute name, and attribute value) filtered by the parameters sys_subjectNameFilter, sys_subjectType, sys_securityProvider, sys_roleNameFilter, and sys_attributeNameFilter.

PSXDataSet.name: sys_catalogRoleSubjectAttributes
PSXDataSet.description: Gets only the role-specific attr. for a set of subjects (sorted by subject name, attr. name, role name and attr. value) filtered by the params sys_subjectNameFilter, sys_subjectType, sys_securityProvider, sys_roleNameFilter, and sys_attributeNameFilter.

PSXDataSet.name: sys_catalogOuterJoinSubjectAttributes
PSXDataSet.description: Gets list of subjects and their attr. (sorted by subject name, attr. name and value) filtered by the parameters sys_{subjectNameFilter,subjectType,securityProvider,roleNameFilter,attributeNameFilter}. Subjects with no matching attr. will be included.
